snippet.title: Survive the Fall - New Trailer | FGS LIVE FROM GDC
snippet.description:
A new trailer for open world action-stealth game, Survive The Fall, which is coming to PC in 2025. Players must explore, loot and fight their way through a post-apocalyptic future after a devastating meteor strike. 

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #gdc #survivethefall

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
